404_2: Do not panic, we can help you.
SWITCH_BAR_INFOS: Toggle karaoke title/lyrics in progress bar
WEBAPPMODE_CLOSED_API_MESSAGE: Sorrymasen, API is disabled right now.
PLAYLIST_SMART_SHUFFLE: Smart shuffle playlist (for better group experience)
NOLYRICS: No lyrics available for this kara
CL_WRONG_KARA_ORDER:
Kara positions in this playlist are messed up, refreshing it.
Please try again.
CL_ADD_RANDOM_TITLE: How many random songs do you want to add ?
GOTO_TOP: Go to the start of the playlist
GOTO_PLAYING: Go to the kara currently playing
GOTO_BOTTOM: Go to the end of the playlist

LOG_OFFLINE.TITLE: Instance offline
LOG_OFFLINE.MESSAGE: Changes to your profile will not be registered

NO_MORE_GUESTS_AVAILABLE: No more guest accounts available, please create your own account!
UNKNOWN_ERROR: Something wrong happened. Here's the message :
UNAUTHORIZED: Access forbidden. Your role doesn't permit this action
PL_VIEW_SONGS_CURRENT_ERROR: Unable to list current playlist's songs
PL_VIEW_SONGS_PUBLIC_ERROR: Unable to list public playlists's songs
PL_SET_CURRENT_ERROR: Unable to set %s as current playlist
PL_SET_CURRENT_PUBLIC_ERROR: A public playlist cannot be set to current. Set another playlist to public first.
PL_SET_CURRENT: Playlist %s is now the current playlist
PL_SET_PUBLIC_ERROR: Unable to set %s as public playlist
PL_SET_PUBLIC_CURRENT_ERROR: A current playlist cannot be set to public. Set another playlist to current first.
PL_SET_PUBLIC: Playlist %s is now the public playlist
PL_ADD_SONG_ERROR: Unable to add one or more karaokes to playlist %s
PL_MOVE_SONG_ERROR: Unable to transfer karaoke to playlist %s
PL_DELETE_SONG_ERROR: Unable to delete karaoke from playlist %s
WL_ADD_SONG_ERROR: Unable to add karaoke to whitelist
WL_DELETE_SONG_ERROR: Unable to delete karaoke from whitelist
BLC_VIEW_FORBIDDEN: Displaying blacklist criterias is not allowed
SONG_VIEW_ERROR: Unable to display karaoke info for %s
PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_ALREADY_ADD: This song is already present in the playlist
PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_QUOTA_REACH: You can't add any more songs for now. Wait until one of your songs is played!
PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_NO_DUPLICAT: Playlist cannot have duplicate series or singers
USER_CREATE_ERROR_ONLINE: Unable to create the online user
USER_ALREADY_EXISTS_ONLINE: This username already exists on that online instance
USER_DELETE_ERROR_ONLINE: Unable to convert user to local
FAVORITES_ADD_SONG_ERROR: Unable to add %s to your favorites
TOOLTIP_ADDKARA: Add this kara to the playlist
TOOLTIP_ADDKARA_ADMIN: right click to append it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_TRANSFERKARA: Transfer this kara - right click to transfer it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_UPVOTE: Free this kara from user's quota
UPVOTE_NO_SELF: You can not upvote your own karaoke
DOWNVOTE_NO_SELF: You can not downvote your own karaoke
INTRO_ADMIN_INTRO1:
Welcome to Karaoke Mugen!

Before we begin, write down the admin account password somewhere:
%s

This account can't be deleted and will allow you to login in case there's a problem with the account we are going to create next.
INTRO_ADMIN_INTRO2:
Karaoke Mugen uses an account system to manage and participate in your karaoke session.

Enter a user name and a password.

You can modify your nickname later (but not your user name!)

Click on continue.
INTRO_ADMIN_INTRO3:
Welcome %s !

Your Karaoke Mugen is configured, we are now going to show you how it works.

To redo this configuration, set the App : FirstRun setting to true in your config.yml file, in the same folder as the Karaoke Mugen executable.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS: Here are your playlists. You can manage them from this screen. We will learn more on them later.
INTRO_ADMIN_LECTEUR:
Here is the control panel.
You can manage your karaoke as you wish.
We have selected 5 random songs from your collection to have a playlist ready to play. Press Play to test it out.
INTRO_ADMIN_MODE:
There are two main modes in Karaoke Mugen, private and public. This button allows you to switch from one to the other.

- Private (default) : When someone adds a song, it goes directly into the current playlist and will be played when the time comes. It's perfect with trusted people.

- Public : Songs added go to the public playlist as a "suggestion". This list isn't read by the player, it's up to the admin (you!) to choose which songs you like, and transfer them to the current playlist so the player can play them!
This is the recommended mode to avoid abuse, for example if you have a big crowd participating. Karaoke needs curation!
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_2:
But let's go back to playlists.
There are several types :

- The Karas list is your song database. This is where your users are going to search for songs they want to add. It is unique.

- The list with the Current attribute is the one displayed on the screen. It is also unique.

- The list with the Public attribute is the one where your public will enter their suggestions.

- Lists with a visible attribute are visible to your public. Disable it if you want to hide some lists !

- Lists with Faves in their name are your users' favorites lists.

- Lists with Automix in their name are automatically created with your users' favorites.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_MANAGE: Here, you can choose which playlist to display, change its properties or search inside.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_MANAGE_BUTTON:
This button allows you to show advanced actions.
Press it to continue.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_MANAGE_ADVANCED:
In advanced mode, you can act on several songs at once by selecting them first.
Use the action buttons like or .

Possible actions change depending on the type of playlist displayed and the destination playlist.

There are other advanced actions available, hover your mouse over a button to see what it does, or read the documentation for more information.
INTRO_ADMIN_SETTINGS:
Karaoke Mugen is very customizable via its options panel.
You can access it by pressing this button.
INTRO_ADMIN_SETTINGS_SCREEN:
This is where you can configure Karaoke Mugen. Try out different settings to see what suits you best.
Some of them will only be taken into account after the current song ends.
INTRO_ADMIN_INTROFINAL:
We're done! You can now sing!

Thanks for reading this far. We are now going to disable the Dummy Plug System so you can pilot your EV... karaoke.

Note : to be able to use the public interface, your users will need to be on the same Wifi network as you.

If you want more songs than the default ones provided here, go to the system panel to browse through the online database and choose which songs you'd like to get, or download everything.

Read more :

- Documentation
- FAQ
- Contact the team (twitter / discord)

Click on Finish!
INTRO_PUBLIC_INTRO1:
Welcome to Karaoke Mugen!

You will be able to add your favorite songs to the playlist during this karaoke session.

If you like, you can create a new account. If not, click on Continue as guest.
INTRO_PUBLIC_INTRO2:
Hello %s!

Karaoke Mugen has two screens :
The search screen (in the background right now), and the playlist screen.
INTRO_PUBLIC_INTRO2_WIDE:
Hello %s!

Karaoke Mugen has two panels:
The search panel (left), and the playlist panel (right).
INTRO_PUBLIC_PROGRESSBAR: You can see the current song's title here..
INTRO_PUBLIC_SEARCH: If you want to add a song, you can search for it in this box.
INTRO_PUBLIC_SEARCH_WIDE:
If you want to add a song, you can search for it in this box.

It is also possible to replace the song's title with the currently displayed lyrics with the switch button /

Also, if you like taking risks, you can click on the clover button to add a random song!
INTRO_PUBLIC_SEARCHRESULT:
Search results are displayed here.
You can scroll the list as you wish.

To add a song, simply slide it to the right.
INTRO_PUBLIC_SEARCHRESULT_WIDE:
Search results are displayed here.
You can scroll the list as you wish.

To add a song, simply click on .
INTRO_PUBLIC_KARA: Now, tap a karaoke song to display detailed information and advanced actions.
INTRO_PUBLIC_KARA_WIDE: To display detailed information on a song and other advanced actions, click on the button on the left
INTRO_PUBLIC_KARADETAILS: Depending on how this karaoke session is configured, there are buttons to show lyrics, add the song to favorites or watch a video preview.
INTRO_PUBLIC_FOOTER:
Your position in the list is shown here, these arrows allow you to go to the top or bottom.
If left : x is displayed, x is your number of allowed songs to add.
INTRO_PUBLIC_FAVORITES: Also, you can filter the list here, showing for example the most recently added songs, or your favorites (an account is needed)
INTRO_PUBLIC_CHANGE_SCREEN: Swipe quickly the screen to the left to see the est of the app.
INTRO_PUBLIC_PLAYLISTS:
The playlist screen allows you to browse through different lists.
Depending on the karaoke mode, your songs are added directly to the current playlist or to the public playlist, different from the current list.

You can also « like » a suggestion if you think it's good enough, giving it more weight. Popular suggestions won't count into the quota of the user who requested them.
INTRO_PUBLIC_CHANGE_SCREEN2: Swipe quickly the scren to the right to get back to the search screen.
INTRO_PUBLIC_MENU:
We're almost there! Here's the menu.

You can go through this tutorial again with the button.

The button will allow you to edit your profile and see who's logged in.

It is also possible to replace the currently playing song title by its lyrics with the switch / button.

Last, if you like risk, you can click on the clover button to add a random song!
INTRO_PUBLIC_MENU_WIDE:
We're almost there! Here's the menu.

You can go through this tutorial again with the button.

The button will allow you to edit your profile and see who's logged in.
INTRO_PUBLIC_LAST:
Okay! Now let's sing!

Have fun!

Click on Finish.
FIRST_PUBLIC_RUN_WELCOME: Hey, looks like it's your first time here!
KARA_SUGGESTION_MAIL: Can't find your favorite song? Click here
KARA_SUGGESTION_LINK: You will soon be able to see it at this address : issues list

ONLINE_STATS.TITLE: Stats
ONLINE_STATS.INTRO: Karaoke Mugen can send anonymous information about your instance to Karaoke Mugen Server to establish usage statistics.

DETAILS.1: Which karaokes are favorited (but not by whom)
DETAILS.3: Which karaokes gott requested (but not by whom)
DETAILS.4: Information about the computer (CPU, available RAM, OS name and version ...)
DETAILS.5: Application' settings (excluding any private info like password)
DETAILS.TITLE: Details of sent informations
DETAILS.OUTRO: Stats are sent at each startup, then at each hour of use. You can consult the information sent in the Karaoke Mugen log file.

ONLINE_STATS.CHANGE: You can change your choice at any time from the options.
ONLINE_STATS.QUESTION: Do you agree to send these statistics to Karaoke Mugen Server?
